title: Roleplaying with Structure: Synthetic Therapist-Client Conversation Generation from Questionnaires
summary: The development of AI for mental health is hindered by a lack of authentic therapy dialogues, due to strict privacy regulations and the fact that clinical sessions were historically rarely recorded. We present an LLM-driven pipeline that generates synthetic counseling dialogues based on structured client profiles and psychological questionnaires.
